meanings.definition: relating to or denoting an insect of the order Diptera, which comprises the two-winged or true flies
meanings.sent1: The dipteran wings were small and delicate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the dipteran species to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The dipteran insect tried to fly with only one wing, causing a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as swift as a dipteran darting through the air.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the buzzing of dipteran creatures.

meanings.sent1: I spotted a dipteran resting on a leaf.
meanings.sent2: The dipteran buzzed around the room, looking for a place to land.
meanings.sent3: The dipteran seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the other insects.
meanings.sent4: The dipteran was a tiny marvel of nature, perfectly adapted to its environment.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the colorful dipteran flying overhead.
